gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，我昨天忘了帶鑰匙了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Oh no, I forgot to bring my keys yesterday.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, wǒ zuótiān wàngle dài yàoshi le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，天氣真糟糕。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Oh, the weather is really bad.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, tiānqì zhēn zāogāo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，現在的年輕人都太依賴手機了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Sigh, young people nowadays rely too much on their mobile phones.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, xiànzài de niánqīngrén dōu tài yīlài shǒujī le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，我好想念我的家鄉。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Ah, I miss my hometown so much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, wǒ hǎo xiǎngniàn wǒ de jiāxiāng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 唉，現在的物價真的越來越高了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Alas, the prices of goods nowadays are really getting higher and higher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āi, xiànzài de wùjià zhēn de yuè lái yuè gāo le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 家長應該愛護孩子的安全。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Parents should protect their children's safety.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Jiāzhǎng yīnggāi àihù háizi de ānquán.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛護環境，不要隨便亂丟垃圾。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should protect the environment and not litter randomly.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àihù huánjìng, bùyào suíbiàn luàn diū lājī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 學校提倡學生愛護公物，不要隨意破壞。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The school encourages students to take care of public property and not to damage it at will.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xuéxiào tíchàng xuéshēng àihù gōngwù, bùyào suíyì pòhuài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 志願者們每天都在愛護流浪動物。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Volunteers take care of stray animals every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhìyuànzhěmen měitiān dōu zài àihù liúlàng dòngwù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛護我們的文化遺產，不要隨便毀壞。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should protect our cultural heritage and not destroy it casually.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àihù wǒmen de wénhuà yíchǎn, bùyào suíbiàn huǐhuài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛惜我們的環境。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should cherish our environment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àixī wǒmen de huánjìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書是我非常愛惜的寶貝。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This book is a treasure that I cherish very much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū shì wǒ fēicháng àixī de bǎobèi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該愛惜大自然的資源。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should treasure the resources of nature.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi àixī dàzìrán de zīyuán.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 愛惜時間，珍惜每一刻。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Cherish time, treasure every moment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Àixī shíjiān, zhēnxī měi yī kè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她非常愛惜她的健康。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She cherishes her health very much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā fēicháng àixī tā de jiànkāng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他有一顆善良的愛心。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He has a kind heart.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yǒu yī kē shànliáng de àixīn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該用愛心對待他人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should treat others with love and compassion.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi yòng àixīn duìdài tārén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 捐款是一個表達愛心的方式。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Donating money is a way to show compassion.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Juānkuǎn shì yī gè biǎodá àixīn de fāngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 學生們對他們的老師充滿了愛心。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The students have a lot of love for their teacher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xuéshēngmen duì tāmen de lǎoshī chōngmǎnle àixīn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 有愛心的人總是樂於助人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: People with a loving heart are always willing to help others.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yǒu àixīn de rén zǒng shì lèyú zhùrén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我會用溫暖的話語來安慰她。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I will use comforting words to console her.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ huì yòng wēnnuǎn de huàyǔ lái ānwèi tā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們到醫院去安慰病人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They went to the hospital to comfort the patients.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen dào yīyuàn qù ānwèi bìngrén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 在困難的時候，朋友的安慰很重要。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: During difficult times, the comfort of friends is important.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zài kùnnan de shíhou, péngyǒu de ānwèi hěn zhòngyào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的話語安慰了我受傷的心靈。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her words comforted my wounded soul.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de huàyǔ ānwèi le wǒ shòushāng de xīnlíng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我知道該如何安慰傷心的人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I know how to console someone who is heartbroken.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zhīdào gāi rúhé ānwèi shāngxīn de rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請問這個電視怎麼安裝？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Excuse me, how do you install this television?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐngwèn zhège diànshì zěnme ānzhuāng?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要找人來安裝空調。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to find someone to install the air conditioning.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào zhǎo rén lái ānzhuāng kōngtiáo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 安裝這個軟體需要一些時間。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: It takes some time to install this software.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Ānzhuāng zhège ruǎntǐ xūyào yīxiē shíjiān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我剛剛安裝了一個新的應用程式。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I just installed a new application.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ gānggāng ānzhuāngle yīgè xīn de yìngyòng chéngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們會幫你在家裡安裝網路。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They will help you install the internet at home.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen huì bāng nǐ zài jiālǐ ānzhuāng wǎnglù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 小船停在岸邊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The small boat stopped at the shore.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xiǎo chuán tíng zài àn biān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他站在河岸上看風景。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He stood on the riverbank and admired the scenery.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zhàn zài hé àn shàng kàn fēngjǐng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他游過去到對岸。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He swam across to the other side of the shore.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yóu guòqù dào duì'àn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡坐在海岸上看日出。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I enjoy sitting on the coast and watching the sunrise.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zuò zài hǎi'àn shàng kàn rìchū.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 傍晚時分，他們漫步在湖岸邊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In the evening, they took a stroll along the lakeshore.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bàngwǎn shí fēn, tāmen mànbù zài hú'àn biān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他非常把握自己的未來。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is very confident about his future.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā fēicháng bǎwò zìjǐ de wèilái.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要把握這個機會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to grasp this opportunity.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào bǎwò zhège jīhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你能把握住這個問題的關鍵嗎？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Can you grasp the key to this problem?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ néng bǎwò zhù zhège wèntí de guānjiàn ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該把握住學習的機會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should take advantage of the opportunity to learn.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎwò zhù xuéxí de jīhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 要成功，你必須把握好每個機會。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: To succeed, you must seize every opportunity.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yào chénggōng, nǐ bìxū bǎwò hǎo měi gè jīhuì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他把書擺在桌子上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He put the book on the table.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ shū bǎi zài zhuōzi shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她把菜擺在盤子裡。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She arranged the food on the plate.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ cài bǎi zài pánzi lǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡把家裡打掃乾淨再擺張桌子。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to clean the house and then set up a table.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan bǎ jiālǐ dǎsǎo gānjìng zài bǎi zhāng zhuōzi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 媽媽把花瓶擺在窗前。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Mom put the vase in front of the window.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Māmā bǎ huāpíng bǎi zài chuāng qián.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 明年我想把房間的擺設改變一下。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Next year, I want to change the arrangement of the room.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngnián wǒ xiǎng bǎ fángjiān de bǎishè gǎibiàn yīxià.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們的班主任很嚴格。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Our class teacher is very strict.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen de bānzhǔrèn hěn yángé.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 班主任給我們上了一堂有趣的課。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The class teacher gave us an interesting lesson.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bānzhǔrèn gěi wǒmen shàng le yī táng yǒuqù de kè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 班主任負責管理學生的學習和生活。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The class teacher is responsible for managing students' learning and life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bānzhǔrèn fùzé guǎnlǐ xuéshēng de xuéxí hé shēnghuó.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我非常感謝我們的班主任對我們的關心和幫助。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am very grateful for the care and help from our class teacher.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ fēicháng gǎnxiè wǒmen de bānzhǔrèn duì wǒmen de guānxīn hé bāngzhù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 班主任在我們的成長過程中起著重要的作用。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The class teacher plays an important role in our growth process.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bānzhǔrèn zài wǒmen de chéngzhǎng guòchéng zhōng qǐ zhe zhòngyào de zuòyòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要辦理簽證。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to handle the visa application.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào bànlǐ qiānzhèng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請到辦公室去辦理手續。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please go to the office to handle the procedures.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng dào bàngōngshì qù bànlǐ shǒuxù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個任務需要我們來辦理。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This task needs us to handle it.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège rènwu xūyào wǒmen lái bànlǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他需要找人來幫忙辦理手術。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He needs to find someone to help with the surgery.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xūyào zhǎo rén lái bāngmáng bànlǐ shǒushù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你需要辦理會議室的預訂手續。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You need to handle the reservation procedures for the conference room.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ xūyào bànlǐ huìyìshì de yùdìng shǒuxù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的演出非常棒。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His performance is excellent.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de yǎnchū fēicháng bàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她是一位棒球選手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She is a baseball player.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi bàngqiú xuǎnshǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書寫得很棒，值得一讀。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This book is written very well and worth reading.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū xiě de hěn bàng, zhíde yī dú.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的成績一直很棒。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His grades have always been excellent.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de chéngjī yīzhí hěn bàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這間餐廳的食物很棒。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The food at this restaurant is great.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè jiān cāntīng de shíwù hěn bàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 傍晚的時候天空非常美麗。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The sky is very beautiful in the evening.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bàngwǎn de shíhòu tiānkōng fēicháng měilì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡在傍晚散步。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to take a walk in the evening.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zài bàngwǎn sànbù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 傍晚的時候清涼一些。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: It gets cooler in the evening.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bàngwǎn de shíhòu qīngliáng yīxiē.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我在傍晚時看了一部好電影。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I watched a good movie in the evening.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zài bàngwǎn shí kànle yībù hǎo diànyǐng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 傍晚的時候我喜歡吃水果。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to eat fruits in the evening.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bàngwǎn de shíhòu wǒ xǐhuān chī shuǐguǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個包裹很重。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This package is very heavy.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bāoguǒ hěn zhòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請幫我收下這個包裹。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please help me accept this package.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ shōu xià zhège bāoguǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他昨天寄了個包裹給我。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He sent me a package yesterday.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zuótiān jì le gè bāoguǒ gěi wǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個包裹是用紙箱包的。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This package is wrapped in a cardboard box.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bāoguǒ shì yòng zhǐxiāng bāo de.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個包裹有什麼東西？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: What's in this package?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bāoguǒ yǒu shénme dōngxī?

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This box contains five cakes.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège hézi bāohánle wǔ gè dàngāo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書包含了很多有用的資訊。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This book contains a lot of useful information.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū bāohánle hěnduō yǒuyòng de zīxùn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège shípǔ bāohánle suǒyǒu de shícái hé bùzhòu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個公司的產品包含了各種各樣的功能。

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège gōngsī de chǎnpǐn bāohánle gèzhǒng gèyàng de gōngnéng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們的計劃包含了市場調查和競爭分析。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Our plan includes market research and competitive analysis.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen de jìhuà bāohánle shìchǎng diàochá hé jìngzhēng fēnxī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡吃包子。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to eat steamed buns.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān chī bāozi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這家店的包子很好吃。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The steamed buns at this store are delicious.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn de bāozi hěn hǎochī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我會做鮮肉包子。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I can make steamed buns with fresh meat filling.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ huì zuò xiānròu bāozi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 媽媽每周會買包子作為早餐。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Mom buys steamed buns as breakfast every week.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Māmā měi zhōu huì mǎi bāozi zuòwéi zǎocān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我想吃一個肉包子和一個豆沙包子。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I want to eat a meat bun and a red bean bun.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng chī yī gè ròu bāozi hé yī gè dòushā bāozi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她穿了一件薄外套。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She is wearing a thin jacket.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā chuān le yī jiàn báo wàitào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書的頁數很薄。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The pages of this book are thin.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū de yèshù hěn báo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這種材料很薄但很堅韌。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This material is thin but very tough.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng cáiliào hěn báo dàn hěn jiānrèn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他吐了一口薄唾沫。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He spat out a thin spit.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā tù le yī kǒu báo tuòmo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個字的寫法很薄。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The handwriting of this word is thin.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège zì de xiěfǎ hěn báo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個寶貝是我們的驕傲。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This baby is our pride.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bǎobèi shì wǒmen de jiāo'ào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他把寶貝妹妹抱在懷裡。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He holds his baby sister in his arms.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bǎ bǎobèi mèimei bào zài huái lǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 媽媽對寶貝兒子的溺愛是無條件的。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: A mother's unconditional love for her baby son.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Māmā duì bǎobèi érzi de nì'ài shì wútiáojiàn de.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個寶貝有一頭亮麗的金髮。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This baby has a head of beautiful blond hair.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège bǎobèi yǒu yītóu liànglì de jīnfà.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 寶貝睡得如此安穩。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The baby sleeps so peacefully.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bǎobèi shuì de rúcǐ ānwěn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個手錶很寶貴。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This watch is very precious.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège shǒubiǎo hěn bǎoguì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我非常珍惜這份寶貴的友情。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I treasure this precious friendship very much.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ fēicháng zhēnxī zhè fèn bǎoguì de yǒuqíng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 家人的關心是最寶貴的禮物。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The care of family is the most precious gift.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Jiārén de guānxīn shì zuì bǎoguì de lǐwù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 時間是我們最寶貴的資源。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Time is our most precious resource.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Shíjiān shì wǒmen zuì bǎoguì de zīyuán.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這些珠寶非常寶貴，要小心保存。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: These jewels are very precious, be careful to preserve them.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhèxiē zhūbǎo fēicháng bǎoguì, yào xiǎoxīn bǎocún.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們努力保持健康的生活方式。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They strive to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen nǔlì bǎochí jiànkāng de shēnghuó fāngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個團隊一直保持著高效率。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This team has always maintained high efficiency.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège tuánduì yīzhí bǎochízhe gāoxiàolǜ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她總是保持著愉快的心情。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She always maintains a cheerful mood.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zǒngshì bǎochízhe yúkuài de xīnqíng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們應該保持冷靜並做出明智的決定。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should keep calm and make wise decisions.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎochí lěngjìng bìng zuòchū míngzhì de juédìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 保持良好的衛生習慣是預防疾病的關鍵。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Maintaining good hygiene habits is key to preventing diseases.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Bǎochí liánghǎo de wèishēng xíguàn shì yùfáng jíbìng de guānjiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我常常使用雲端服務進行數據的存儲。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I often use cloud services to store data.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ chángcháng shǐyòng yúnduān fúwù jìnxíng shùjù de cúnchǔ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個外接硬碟可以提供大量的存儲空間。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This external hard drive can provide a large storage space.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège wàijiē yìngdié kěyǐ tígōng dàliàng de cúnchǔ kōngjiān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個應用程式可以幫助你輕鬆地將照片存儲到電腦上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This application can help you easily store photos on your computer.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège yìngyòng chéngxù kěyǐ bāngzhù nǐ qīngsōng de jiāng zhàopiàn cúnchǔ dào diànnǎo shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要一個可靠的存儲方式來保存這些重要文件。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need a reliable storage method to save these important documents.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào yīgè kěkào de cúnchǔ fāngshì lái bǎocún zhèxiē zhòngyào wénjiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 為了保護數據，我們必須定期進行存儲的備份。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In order to protect the data, we must regularly back up the storage.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wèile bǎohù shùjù, wǒmen bìxū dìngqī jìnxíng cúnchǔ de bèifèn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 公司保留所有的文件。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The company keeps all the documents.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Gōngsī bǎoliú suǒyǒu de wénjiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 請保留你的票根作爲收據。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please keep your ticket stub as a receipt.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng bǎoliú nǐ de piàogēn zuò wéi shōujù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個餐廳保留傳統的烹飪方式。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This restaurant maintains traditional cooking methods.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège cāntīng bǎoliú chuántǒng de pēngrèn fāngshì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡保留一些回憶。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to keep some memories.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān bǎoliú yīxiē huíyì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他堅持保留習慣和傳統。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He insists on preserving customs and traditions.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā jiānchí bǎoliú xíguàn hé chuántǒng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 買車的時候一定要買保險。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: When buying a car, you must definitely get insurance.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Mǎi chē de shíhòu yīdìng yào mǎi bǎoxiǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們為自己的家買了房屋保險。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They bought home insurance for their house.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen wèi zìjǐ de jiā mǎile fángwū bǎoxiǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 上大學時，學校會為學生提供健康保險。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: When going to college, the school provides health insurance for the students.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Shàng dàxué shí, xuéxiào huì wèi xuéshēng tígōng jiànkāng bǎoxiǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 投資者應該考慮購買股票保險。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Investors should consider purchasing stock insurance.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tóuzī zhě yīnggāi kǎolǜ gòumǎi gǔpiào bǎoxiǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 旅遊時，很重要的一點是買旅行保險。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: When traveling, it is very important to buy travel insurance.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Lǚyóu shí, hěn zhòngyào de yīdiǎn shì mǎi lǚxíng bǎoxiǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我每天都要寫報告。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I have to write reports every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān dōu yào xiě bàogào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你能幫我寫報告嗎？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Can you help me write the report?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ néng bāng wǒ xiě bàogào ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這份報告很詳細。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This report is very detailed.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè fèn bàogào hěn xiángxi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 公司的年度報告已經出來了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The company's annual report is already out.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Gōngsī de niándù bàogào yǐjīng chūlái le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 經理要求我們提交月度報告。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The manager requested us to submit monthly reports.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Jīnglǐ yāoqiú wǒmen tígōng yuèdù bàogào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他對未來感到悲觀。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He feels pessimistic about the future.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā duì wèilái gǎndào bēiguān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這種悲觀的想法並不利於解決問題。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This pessimistic mindset is not conducive to problem-solving.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng bēiguān de xiǎngfǎ bìng bù lìyú jiějué wèntí.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的悲觀情緒影響了她的生活。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her pessimistic mood has affected her life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de bēiguān qíngxù yǐngxiǎngle tā de shēnghuó.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 儘管有困難，但我們不能悲觀失望。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Despite the difficulties, we must not be pessimistic and disappointed.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn yǒu kùnnán, dàn wǒmen bùnéng bēiguān shīwàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 對於未來，我們應該保持樂觀態度，而不是悲觀看待。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: For the future, we should maintain an optimistic attitude instead of viewing it pessimistically.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Duìyú wèilái, wǒmen yīnggāi bǎochí lèguān tàidù, ér bùshì bēiguān kàndài.
